name: Basement with inscription
description:
Found in 1854 near the Linea river (in the area of ​​the old wash house) and behind the semi-circle.
On the main side the text mentions Avianus Vindicianus while on the side shown here are the names of the settlers from Terracina who placed the statue towards the end of the republic.
The inscription is located in the atrium of the municipality of Terracina.

Coloni qui contuler(unt)
in statuam
